thread.title: mediocre
thread.title_full: mediocre - Review of Hotel Les Jardins de Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DSBURNS
title: mediocre
text: Ok on the good side the room was clean and nice. But the rest of the place looks like a hostel and the area is very offbeat urban. Not pleasant. Someone possibly needs to show the male manager on duty that his jokes are also uncomfortable and inappropriate. He joked that i was with not my usual women? in front of my girlfriend? On valentines day? really??
